headline: Bill Gates, Marjorie Taylor Greene Bet On The Same 5 Stocks: Some Might Surprise You
summary: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) is one of the most followed members of Congress when it comes to tracking stock trading activity, thanks to years of strong returns. Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) co-founder Bill Gates is one of the richest people in the world and also owns a portfolio of stocks in the Gates Foundation Trust. Here’s a look at five stocks that appear in both Greene's investment portfolio and the Gates Foundation Trust. The 5 Shared Stocks The Benzinga Government Trades page for
